content: So I think that they're – it’s going to continue, obviously, with crude prices being where they are, and gas prices, there's going to be continued growth in that area, we would expect, tied to takeaway volume. Now one of the things we said last quarter, which I just want to reiterate this quarter as well, I’m not sure you can look at the programmatic unit repurchases we did last year and assume that's what we're going to do this year.
